name: docs2llm
title: Docs2llm
description: Convert documents to and from LLM-friendly formats. PDF, DOCX, images, URLs — to Markdown, JSON, YAML. Export Markdown to Word, PowerPoint, HTML. Rich text clipboard support.
author: ignataleinikov

commands.name: convert-file
commands.title: Convert File
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Pick a file and convert it to Markdown, JSON, or YAML

commands.name: convert-url
commands.title: Convert URL
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Fetch a URL and convert it to Markdown

commands.name: quick-convert
commands.title: Quick Convert
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Convert the selected Finder file to Markdown and copy to clipboard

commands.name: export-markdown
commands.title: Export Markdown
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Convert Markdown to Word, PowerPoint, or HTML via Pandoc

commands.name: markdown-to-rich-text
commands.title: Markdown to Rich Text
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Convert clipboard Markdown to rich HTML — paste formatted text into any app

commands.name: save-clipboard
commands.title: Save Clipboard
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Detect clipboard content and save as a converted file

commands.name: copy-as-rich-text
commands.title: Copy as Rich Text
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Convert selected Finder .md file to rich HTML on clipboard

commands.name: smart-copy
commands.title: Smart Copy
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Auto-detect source (Finder file, selection, clipboard) and convert to clipboard

commands.name: smart-paste
commands.title: Smart Paste
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Convert clipboard content and paste into active app or save to Finder folder

commands.name: smart-save
commands.title: Smart Save
commands.subtitle: docs2llm
commands.description: Auto-detect source and save converted file

preferences.title: Binary Path

preferences.label: Enable OCR for images and scanned documents
